messages.title: Doing politics differently
messages.content: I joined the LibDems because the party reflects my values: fairness, freedom, openness. My values drive not just the policies I believe in, but how I think politics should be conducted. I want to champion those values in public life, by representing Oxford East - which deserves an MP who's a true internationalist, and 100% behind a People's Vote on Brexit.

messages.title: How can we win in Oxford East?
messages.content: Beating Labour from over 30,000 votes behind will be hard work. But these are extraordinary times. We came closest to winning it in 2005 when Labour policy on Iraq alienated traditional Labour voters, but Brexit is even more divisive. This gives us a chance not just to build on Layla Moran's victory, but also to win support in wards where we are weaker for the council elections in 2020.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I'm a passionate Remainer and have campaigned for a People’s Vote since June 2016. But I try hard to understand the many reasons why over 17 million voted Leave and am more driven, incisive, or both.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Working together in the UK's best interests
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Winner takes all politics has not served us well. We need less confrontation, and more collaboration to get things done.

I want to persuade people to vote LibDem by being positive about our ideas, and focusing on evidence of what works - not being negative about other parties or politicians. Most voters are sick of tribal politics. Let's rebuild people's trust by talking about a better future, not past mistakes.

issues.brexitEurope: I'm a passionate Remainer and have campaigned for a People’s Vote since June 2016. But I try hard to understand the many reasons why over 17 million voted Leave and am more driven, incisive, or both.
issues.environment: LibDems need to intensify working with other parties - on Brexit, but also on climate change, social care, housing and other big issues.
issues.government: I place electoral reform high on my priorities to ensure a fairer choice. Meanwhile, LibDems need to intensify working with other parties - on Brexit, but also on climate change, social care, housing and other big issues.
issues.labourEmployment: To do this we will need: a clear campaign plan, excellent teamwork (including with OXWAB), more members helping out, enough money, and high visibility.

community.content: LibDems need to intensify working with other parties - on Brexit, but also on climate change, social care, housing and other big issues.

leaflet.personalStatement: Fighting for disadvantaged people for 25 years, in the public, private and charity sectors. Runs his own consultancy business, while doing research on social mobility and equality of opportunity for young people. Lives with wife Lucy (a public sector HR director), their twins (10), and a rescue greyhound.

politicalExperience.achievements: Expert in Government and Parliament. Worked closely with ministers. Knows what an MP’s job is like.
